Package

tabr

tabr: Guitar tablature and sheet music engraving.

Create tablature

Functions for writing and executing LilyPond files.

tab

Create tablature

lilypond

Save score to LilyPond file

Organizing music

Functions for hierarchical music notation organization.

phrase p

Create a musical phrase

track

Create a music track

trackbind

Bind track tables

score

Create a music score

Phrase helpers

Functions for describing, assembling and connecting musical phrases.

glue dup

Append and duplicate

rest

Create rests

tie

Tied notes

notate

Add text to music staff

hp

Hammer ons and pull offs

tuplet

Tuplets

Repeats

Functions to assist with repeated sections of music.

volta pct

Create a volta/repeat phrase

Chords

Functions for chord description.

chord_set

Generate a chord set

Other functions
